item.title: About
item.description: Read this brief introduction to learn more about me My name is VinKon(Full Name is VinKon He). And I am currently living in China. I am on a gap year, and I need time to recover from a serious mental illness. Most of the time, I’m reading books on Linguistics, Pharmacology, Computer science, and more. I’ll post my thoughts, notes, and research here. Books Iâ€™m reading recently: An Introduction to Language and Linguistics In my free time I play Minecraft, and creating fun projects on Arch Linux.
